data.title: Red Oak 12 - B & B Theatres
data.meta_description: B&B Theatres Red Oak 12 is an incredible, newly-built, luxury entertainment center! The facility is the first-of-its-kind in the state of Texas and offers combinations of amenities unparalleled anywhere in the marketplace.
data.text:
Welcome to B&B Theatres Red Oak 12!

B&B Theatres Red Oak 12 (located at 615 N Interstate 35 E Rd) is an incredible luxury entertainment center! The facility is the first-of-its-kind in the state of Texas and offers combinations of amenities unparalleled anywhere in the marketplace!

Featuring the best in laser projection and digital audio, and unparalleled comfort in heated, electric reclining seats! Red Oak is also home to exclusive theatrical amenities like 270-degree ScreenX, 4DX the B&B Theatres Grand Screen, screenPLAY!, Lyric, and Max Relax auditoriums; as well as B-Roll Bowling, the Outtakes Arcade (featuring a climbing wall), Pickleball and Bocce Ball courts, and Sterling's restaurant! We can't wait for you to experience all that B&B Theatres Red Oak has to offer!

Enjoy the Magic of the Movies!

Age Policy:

Starting at 6PM, no guests under the age of 18 are permitted without a parent or adult guardian 21 years of age or older. Guardians must attend the same movie or activity to supervise the minor(s). Please be prepared to show I.D. upon request.

Identification:

To purchase and/or consume alcoholic beverages, guests must establish they are at least 21 years of age. Each guest must present a valid identification card issued by a state or governmental agency containing a recent photograph, date of birth, height, sex, and color of eyes. B&B Theatres is unable to accept forms of identification that are expired, cracked, altered, duplicated, or damaged in any way.

Smoking:

No smoking is permitted anywhere on B&B Theatres premises, including vaporizers and electronic cigarettes. The use of pipes, cigars, snuff, and chewing tobacco is likewise prohibited.

Outside Food & Drinks:

Food and beverage not prepared and/or served by B&B Theatres are strictly prohibited anywhere on premises.

Sportsmanship:

In addition to exceptional theatrical entertainment options, B&B Theatres invites all to enjoy incredible outdoor entertainment and sporting amenities. All guests are expected to participate fairly and in the spirit of fun. Aggressive competition, unsportsmanlike conduct, and betting/wagering on games is not tolerated.

Shoes and shirts required at all times when on B&B Theatres premises.

NO OPEN CARRY of firearms permitted except by sworn law enforcement personnel.
